column1:
俺は判断を間違えたのか……しっかりプロデュース
していれば、違う結果になったのだろうか……
column2:
Did I make a mistake...? I wonder if my results
producing would've been different if I did better...
column5:
Did I make the wrong decision...? If I had worked
properly, would it have turned out differently...?

column1: （もし、あのときに戻れるなら……）
column2: (If I could go back to that time...)
column5: (If I could go back to that time...)

column1: い、意識が……遠のいて……いく……
column2: M-my consciousness is... drifting... far away...
